text: Shallum son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph,9:19 Ebiasaph is a variant of Abiasaph; see Exodus 6:24. the son of Korah, and his relatives from the Korahites were assigned to guard the thresholds of the Tent, just as their fathers had been assigned to guard the entrance to the dwelling of the LORD.
